name: Romania.github.io
body:
### Romania Open Source
Guvernul român sucks! A facut u hackathon in care au invitat elevii de la licee mari de informatica.
FAIL!

[Buget](http://buget.gov.ro/)
[Petiții](http://petitii.gov.ro/)
[Posturi](http://posturi.gov.ro/)
[Angajati](http://angajati.gov.ro/)
[Aplicatii de mobil](http://hackrogov.cloudapp.net/mobile.htm)

### Ideea

Am vazut orasul [Chicago](https://github.com/chicago) e destul de awesome si a facut publica lista de proiecte pe care le face.


### Ce exista pana acum:

[Baza de date de autogari](https://github.com/romania/autogari)
{Baza de date de la CFR](Work in Progress)
[Baza de date de coduri postale](https://github.com/romania/coduri-postale)
[Baza de date de CNP-uri](https://github.com/bucharest/cnp) (Bucuresti) 
[Baza de date de statii RATB](https://github.com/bucharest/ratb)
[Baza de date de localitati](https://github.com/romania/localitati)

### De facut

* [insse](http://www.insse.ro/cms/rw/pages/index.ro.do) cateva date gratis restu costa, 
* [Camera deputatilor](http://www.cdep.ro/pls/legis/legis_pck.frame) crawl all the laws
* Monitorul Oficial


### Cine?
@necenzurat

### Contact
necenzurat+romania@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
